topics.body:
"@AaronMk":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/52d4c45f63687215b37d0000#post_52d4c45f63687215b37d0000
Perfect inspiration for an urban dungeon in an RPG.
It's kind of sad they demolished it. It was a masterpiece of architectural mess.
topics.author: 4fde5cee945b700a970060fc

topics.body:
"@SeraphimDawn":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/52d4c71d636872463f4a0100#post_52d4c71d636872463f4a0100

I have full intentions to utilize it in an RP post I'm writing. Based on when the RP is, and its conditions, it's still standing. I was flipping through photos of it for visual and atmospheric representation to get ready.

Though I may not get to actually writing that part until maybe tomorrow, and then holding onto it until I can post. I got time.


And though I've already seen images of it and done a good amount of reading, Kowloon never ceases to amaze me. I joked with a friend there was probably a rat the size of an SUV living in that city somewhere. Probably got confused for a dog.
topics.author: 4fe4bf947f123b175b000001

topics.body:
"@AaronMk":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/52d4c45f63687215b37d0000#post_52d4c45f63687215b37d0000
I have a morbid fascination with places like that.
topics.author: 4fddff15945b706cf6000520

topics.body:
"@PonyPon":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/52d4c803636872564e160300#post_52d4c803636872564e160300

And the closest I got is Detroit.

Which isn't as near mismanaged and unorganized as Kowloon.
topics.author: 4fe4bf947f123b175b000001

topics.body:
"@AaronMk":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/52d4c7b863687215fcd80300#post_52d4c7b863687215fcd80300
Kowloon was Triad haven. They ran the place and collected _taxes_ from businesses and resident there. The place had an interesting history, from being a fort to the Japanese occupation. It's like a manmade cave. I think to closet I could compare Kowloon to a fantasy dungeon is Zozo from Final Fantasy 6.
topics.author: 4fde5cee945b700a970060fc

topics.body:
Hey guys, you know Winnie The Pooh's Home Run Derby and how people talked about how the pitchers from Owl and above are demon centurions from the 7th circle of hell right? There's an option on the bottom-right corner "Status" that allows you to upgrade your skills. Makes things easier for you guys.

(Protips: Take advantage of Rabbit's slow start to set up your position. I don't know about Owl but it is best to go as close to the front as possible for Tigger and time your swings.)
topics.author: 50d9a3aea4c72dc9b3000120

topics.body:
"It's always fun to borrow from Fallout Equestria's meta, in-story leveling system for semi-related shit.":http://www.minecraftforum.net/topic/1908000-fallout-the-wild-west-a-new-chapter-accepting/page__st__360#entry27999244

And now to wait forever for someone to post, and I can move onto the next stage of the adventure, get closer to a battle with a dildo-armed robot, get abducted my aliens, and meet up with my friend's character so we can drive a battle-bus across America.

topics.body:
"@Ore-O":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/52d5e089636872294adc0300#post_52d5e089636872294adc0300

And the fun thing all of this is planned as a joke, or was planned as. But so far I've taken to writing it from a more serious thing as I try to slip in a few Fallout elements.

The dildo-armed robot isn't new either, me and my friends have been shoe-horning him into shitty RPs for a while. Our first adventures with him being crashing a "resort" RP and initiating a "legend of rape.":http://www.minecraftforum.net/topic/1748724-roleplay-player-resort/page__st__120#entry21833499 Also butchering furry characters, animes, and summoning a goat army from a piss-powered portal we found in the casino's basement.
topics.author: 4fe4bf947f123b175b000001

Oops. 

The most "wild thing" I've seen in a hentai was someone making love to a giant, diseased, human husk in a sewer. 

And then feeding it his shit.

And then having it give birth to ten thousand children.
